snippet: In its latest amended prospectus, the Carlyle Group disclosed several details about the firm, including the compensation for its top executives and its surprising choice of listing venue.
abstract: In its latest amended prospectus, the Carlyle Group disclosed several details about the firm, including the compensation for its top executives and its surprising choice of listing venue.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

lead_paragraph: In its latest amended prospectus, the Carlyle Group is shedding more light on its operations -- with its executives' compensation among the juiciest new revelations.

headline.main: Carlyle Reveals Executive Pay and Sets I.P.O. on Nasdaq
